title: Propulsion Assignment
description: This assignment explores the fundamentals of rocket propulsion, focusing on the principles of thrust generation, specific impulse, and propulsion efficiency. Students will analyze different propulsion systems, perform performance calculations, and understand their applications in space missions.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze combustion processes in rocket engines. Submit a detailed report on combustion efficiency, instability factors, and mitigation strategies.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and optimize a rocket nozzle for specific performance requirements. Include calculations, diagrams, and performance analysis.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Online quiz covering fundamental aerodynamic concepts, fluid dynamics principles, and airfoil design.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze subsonic and supersonic flow characteristics. Submit computational fluid dynamics results and analysis.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Study aerodynamic heating effects and thermal protection systems. Include heat transfer calculations and material analysis.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design spacecraft structural components considering launch loads, thermal cycling, and mission requirements.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Perform orbital mechanics calculations for mission planning. Include trajectory analysis and fuel requirements.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Comprehensive exam covering spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering, integration, and testing procedures.
